name: Kristy's Lasagna
author: Kristy Kniest
summary: This is the best lasagna we have ever had, including restaurants! Great with a salad and garlic bread.
directions: In a large pot cook lasagna noodles in boiling salted water until al dente
In large sauce pan cook ground beef
Combine tomato sauces and tomato paste with ground beef and simmer until bubbly
Add garlic salt and Italian seasoning and reduce heat to low simmer
To assemble, in the bottom of a 13x9 inch baking dish spread a thin layer of sauce
Next, add a layer of noodles, ricotta cheese, sauce/ground beef mixture, and then grated mozzarella cheese
Repeat until baking dish is filled
Garnish top with additional shredded mozzarella cheese
In a preheated 375 degree F(190 degree C) oven bake for 30 minutes or until bubbly
Let stand for 15 minutes and serve
